lead_paragraph: T.J. Oshie and Alex Ovechkin scored in the shootout, and the Washington Capitals tied the game late and beat the New Jersey Devils 3-2 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Oshie, Ovechkin Convert in Shootout; Capitals Top Devils 3-2
headline.main: Oshie, Ovechkin Convert in Shootout; Capitals Top Devils 3-2

snippet: T.J. Oshie and Alex Ovechkin scored in the shootout, and the Washington Capitals tied the game late and beat the New Jersey Devils 3-2 on Saturday....
